remarks: Elementhood in the set of finitely supported functions from ` B ` to ` A ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-May-2015.)  Obsolete version of ~ cantnfs as of 28-Jun-2019.  (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
cantnfsOLD.1 $e |- S = dom ( A CNF B ) $.
cantnfsOLD.2 $e |- ( ph -> A e. On ) $.
cantnfsOLD.3 $e |- ( ph -> B e. On ) $.
cantnfsOLD $p |- ( ph -> ( F e. S <-> ( F : B --> A /\ ( `' F " ( _V \ 1o ) ) e. Fin ) ) ) $.
